ygData.subject: RE: Lore Song suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: Excelent thought Slyde. I think that we should petition for the following. 1. Allow Identify in a trade window 2. Request more Lore on Items, even mundane
ygData.messageBody:
Excelent thought Slyde.

I think that we should petition for the following.

1. Allow Identify in a trade window
2. Request more Lore on Items, even mundane items.

Sevin Tercet 20th Human Bard
on Brell Serilis

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:slide@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 11:57 PM
To: EQ Bards
Subject: [eqbards] Lore Song suggestion



It would be nice if the song would work when cast on items in a =
trade window. This would allow us to help other players with No Drop/No =
Trade identify the lore...

Slyde
